privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: At TechServIT, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data.
howWeUseInformation: To provide, maintain, and improve our services
To communicate with you, including responding to inquiries
To send promotional materials or offers (with your consent)
dataSharingAndDisclosure: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties, except as required by law or with your consent.
We may share your data with trusted service providers to assist in operations such as payment processing and data analytics.
privacyPolicy.dataSecurity: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access or disclosure.

yourRights.access: You have the right to request access to your personal information.
yourRights.correction: You can request corrections to any inaccuracies.
yourRights.deletion: You may request the deletion of your data, subject to legal obligations.

privacyPolicy.updatesToPolicy: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Please review it periodically.
privacyPolicy.contactInformation: For any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at info@techservit.co.za.

termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.introduction: These Terms of Use ("Terms") govern your access and use of the TechServIT website and services.
termsOfUse.acceptanceOfTerms: By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with these Terms. If you do not agree, please refrain from using the website.
useOfWebsite: You agree to use the website for lawful purposes only.
You will not engage in any activity that disrupts or interferes with the website's functionality.
termsOfUse.intellectualProperty: All content, trademarks, and logos are owned by TechServIT or its licensors. Unauthorized use is prohibited.

userAccounts.registration: You may need to create an account to access certain features.
userAccounts.responsibility: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information.

termsOfUse.disclaimerOfWarranties: Our website and services are provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free services.
termsOfUse.limitationOfLiability: TechServIT shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use the website.
termsOfUse.modificationsToTerms: We may revise these Terms at any time. Continued use of the website following changes signifies your acceptance.
termsOfUse.contactInformation: For questions regarding these Terms, please contact us at info@techservit.co.za.
